item.description:
As this will be our first meeting we will be discussing what we plan to do at future meetings. Some ideas include, but are not limited to, book discussion, fundraising for charity, planning gnostic worship services, general shooting of the breeze, etc. We will also do all of the obligatory ?getting to know each other? stuff that all new groups must do. I?m really looking forward to meeting with you!
Update: The UU church has been secured for this Saturday! Directions can be found here: http://uuhaverhill.or...

group.name: St. Sarah's Parish :: Gnostic Church and Discussion Group

item.name: study group organizational meeting
